item.text: And he said to them, “I tell you the truth, there are some standing here who will not experience death before they see the kingdom of God come with power.”
Six days later Jesus took with him Peter, James, and John and led them alone up a high mountain privately. And he was transfigured before them,

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="2440" class="">clothes</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">became</st> <st data-num="4744" class="">radiantly</st> <st data-num="3022" class="">white</st>, <st data-num="3029" class="">more</st> <st data-num="3634" class="">so</st> than any <st data-num="1102" class="">launderer</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="1093" class="">world</st> <st data-num="1410" class="">could</st> <st data-num="3021" class="">bleach</st> them.

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st> <st data-num="2243" class="">Elijah</st> <st data-num="3708">appeared</st> before <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="4862" class="">along with</st> <st data-num="3475" class="">Moses</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> they <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st> <st data-num="4814" class="">talking</st> with <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>,<n id="2" /> “<st data-num="4461">Rabbi</st>, it <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="2570" class="">good</st> for <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> to <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="5602" class="">here</st>. Let <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">make</st> <st data-num="5140" class="">three</st> <st data-num="4633" class="">shelters</st><n id="3" />—<st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> for <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> for <st data-num="3475" class="">Moses</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> for <st data-num="2243" class="">Elijah</st>.”

(<st data-num="1063">For</st> they <st data-num="1096" class="">were</st> <st data-num="1630" class="">afraid</st>, and he did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">what</st> to <st data-num="611" class="">say.)</st><n id="1" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> a <st data-num="3507" class="">cloud</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1982" class="">overshadowed</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> a <st data-num="5456" class="">voice</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">came</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="3507" class="">cloud</st>, “<st data-num="3778">This</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> one <st data-num="27" class="">dear</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st>.<n id="4" /> <st data-num="191" class="">Listen</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>!”<n id="5" />
Suddenly when they looked around, they saw no one with them any more except Jesus.
As they were coming down from the mountain, he gave them orders not to tell anyone what they had seen until after the Son of Man had risen from the dead.
They kept this statement to themselves, discussing what this rising from the dead meant.
Then they asked him, “Why do the experts in the law say that Elijah must come first?”

He <st data-num="5346" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="2243">Elijah</st> does <st data-num="3303">indeed</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st> <st data-num="4413">first</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="600" class="">restores</st> <st data-num="3956">all things</st>. <st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="4459" class="">why</st> is it <st data-num="1125" class="">written</st> <st data-num="2443">that</st> the <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="444" class="">Man</st> must <st data-num="3958" class="">suffer</st> <st data-num="4183">many things</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> be <st data-num="1847" class="">despised</st>?
But I tell you that Elijah has certainly come, and they did to him whatever they wanted, just as it is written about him.”
When they came to the disciples, they saw a large crowd around them and experts in the law arguing with them.

When the <st data-num="3956" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="3793" class="">crowd</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, they were <st data-num="1568" class="">amazed</st> <st data-num="2532">and</st> <st data-num="4370" class="">ran</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2117">at once</st> and <st data-num="782" class="">greeted</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.

He <st data-num="1905" class="">asked</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="5101">What</st> are you <st data-num="4802">arguing about</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>?”

A <st data-num="1520" class="">member</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> the <st data-num="3793" class="">crowd</st> <st data-num="611" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="1320">Teacher</st>, I <st data-num="5342" class="">brought</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">son</st>, who is <st data-num="2192" class="">possessed</st> by a <st data-num="4151" class="">spirit</st> that makes him <st data-num="216" class="">mute</st>.

<st data-num="3699" class="">Whenever</st> it <st data-num="2638" class="">seizes</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, it <st data-num="4486" class="">throws</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="4486">down</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> he <st data-num="875" class="">foams at the mouth</st>, <st data-num="5149" class="">grinds</st> his <st data-num="3599" class="">teeth</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> becomes <st data-num="3583" class="">rigid</st>. I <st data-num="3004" class="">asked</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1544" class="">cast</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st> <st data-num="1544" class="">out</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">but</st><n id="1" /> they were <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2480" class="">able</st> to do so.”<n id="2" />

He <st data-num="611" class="">answered</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="5599" class="">You</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="571" class="">unbelieving</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1074" class="">generation</st>! <st data-num="2193" class="">How much</st> <st data-num="4219">longer</st><n id="4" /> must I <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">with</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>? <st data-num="2193">How much</st> <st data-num="4219">longer</st> must I <st data-num="430" class="">endure</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>?<n id="6" /> <st data-num="5342" class="">Bring</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.”

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st> they <st data-num="5342" class="">brought</st> the <st data-num="846" class="">boy</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>. When the <st data-num="4151" class="">spirit</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, it <st data-num="2117" class="">immediately</st> <st data-num="4952">threw</st> the <st data-num="846" class="">boy</st> <st data-num="4952" class="">into a convulsion</st>. He<n id="2" /> <st data-num="4098" class="">fell</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="1093" class="">ground</st> and <st data-num="2947" class="">rolled around</st>, <st data-num="875" class="">foaming at the mouth</st>.

Jesus<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1905" class="">asked</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">father</st>, “<st data-num="4214">How</st> <st data-num="5550" class="">long</st> has <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> been <st data-num="1096" class="">happening</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>?” <st data-num="1161" class="">And</st> he <st data-num="3004">said</st>, “<st data-num="1537">From</st> <st data-num="3812" class="">childhood</st>.

It has <st data-num="4178" class="">often</st> <st data-num="906" class="">thrown</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="4442" class="">fire</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">or</st> <st data-num="5204" class="">water</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="622" class="">destroy</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>. <st data-num="235" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> you are <st data-num="1410" class="">able</st> to do <st data-num="5100" class="">anything</st>, <st data-num="4697">have compassion</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> and <st data-num="997" class="">help</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>.”

<st data-num="1161">Then</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “‘<st data-num="1487">If</st> you are <st data-num="1410" class="">able?’</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3956">All things</st> are <st data-num="1415" class="">possible</st> for the one who <st data-num="4100" class="">believes</st>.”
Immediately the father of the boy cried out and said, “I believe; help my unbelief!”
Now when Jesus saw that a crowd was quickly gathering, he rebuked the unclean spirit, saying to it, “Mute and deaf spirit, I command you, come out of him and never enter him again.”

It <st data-num="2896" class="">shrieked</st>, <st data-num="4682" class="">threw</st> him <st data-num="4682">into</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">terrible</st> <st data-num="4682" class="">convulsions</st>, and <st data-num="1831" class="">came out</st>. The boy<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1096" class="">looked</st> <st data-num="5616">so much like</st> a <st data-num="3498" class="">corpse</st> <st data-num="5620" class="">that</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “He is <st data-num="599" class="">dead</st>!”
But Jesus gently took his hand and raised him to his feet, and he stood up.
Then, after he went into the house, his disciples asked him privately, “Why couldn’t we cast it out?”
He told them, “This kind can come out only by prayer.”
They went out from there and passed through Galilee. But Jesus did not want anyone to know,

<st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> he was <st data-num="1321" class="">teaching</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">telling</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “The <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="444" class="">Man</st> will be <st data-num="3860" class="">betrayed</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="5495" class="">hands</st> of <st data-num="444" class="">men</st>.<n id="1" /> They<n id="2" /> will <st data-num="615" class="">kill</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">after</st> <st data-num="5140" class="">three</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st> he will <st data-num="450" class="">rise</st>.”<n id="4" />
But they did not understand this statement and were afraid to ask him.
Then they came to Capernaum. After Jesus was inside the house he asked them, “What were you discussing on the way?”

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> they were <st data-num="4623" class="">silent</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="3598" class="">way</st> they had <st data-num="1256" class="">argued</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">with</st> <st data-num="240" class="">one another</st> about <st data-num="5101" class="">who</st> was the <st data-num="3173">greatest</st>.

After he <st data-num="2523">sat down</st>, he <st data-num="5455" class="">called</st> the <st data-num="1427" class="">Twelve</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="1487">If</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">anyone</st> <st data-num="2309" class="">wants</st> to <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="4413" class="">first</st>, he must <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="2078" class="">last</st> of <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1249" class="">servant</st> of <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st>.”

He <st data-num="2983" class="">took</st> a <st data-num="3813" class="">little child</st> and had <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="2476" class="">stand</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">among</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>. <st data-num="1723" class="">Taking</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1723">in his arms</st>, he <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>,
“Whoever welcomes one of these little children in my name welcomes me, and whoever welcomes me does not welcome me but the one who sent me.”
John said to him, “Teacher, we saw someone casting out demons in your name, and we tried to stop him because he was not following us.”

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st>, “Do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2967" class="">stop</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1063" class="">because</st> <st data-num="3762" class="">no one</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">who</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">does</st> a <st data-num="1411" class="">miracle</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st> will be <st data-num="1410" class="">able</st> <st data-num="5036">soon afterward</st> to <st data-num="2551">say anything bad</st> about <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">whoever</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">against</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="5228" class="">for</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>.
For I tell you the truth, whoever gives you a cup of water because you bear Christ’s name will never lose his reward.
“If anyone causes one of these little ones who believe in me to sin, it would be better for him to have a huge millstone tied around his neck and to be thrown into the sea.

<st data-num="1437" class="">If</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="5495" class="">hand</st> <st data-num="4624">causes</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="4624" class="">to sin</st>, <st data-num="609" class="">cut</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st> off! It <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="2570" class="">better</st> for <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> to <st data-num="1525" class="">enter</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st> <st data-num="2948" class="">crippled</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">than</st> to have<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1417" class="">two</st> <st data-num="5495" class="">hands</st> and <st data-num="565" class="">go</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="1067" class="">hell</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="762" class="">unquenchable</st> <st data-num="4442" class="">fire</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1437" class="">If</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="4228" class="">foot</st> <st data-num="4624" class="">causes</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="4624" class="">to sin</st>, <st data-num="609" class="">cut</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st> <st data-num="609">off</st>! It <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="2570" class="">better</st> to <st data-num="1525" class="">enter</st> <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st> <st data-num="5560" class="">lame</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">than</st> to <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1417" class="">two</st> <st data-num="4228" class="">feet</st> and be <st data-num="906" class="">thrown</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="1067" class="">hell</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1437" class="">If</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3442" class="">eye</st> <st data-num="4624">causes</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="4624" class="">to sin</st>, <st data-num="1544" class="">tear</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st> <st data-num="1544" class="">out</st>!<n id="1" /> It <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="2570" class="">better</st> to <st data-num="1525" class="">enter</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st><n id="2" /> with <st data-num="3442" class="">one eye</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">than</st> to <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1417" class="">two</st> <st data-num="3788" class="">eyes</st> and be <st data-num="906" class="">thrown</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="1067" class="">hell</st>,

<st data-num="3699" class="">where</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="4663" class="">worm</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">never</st> <st data-num="5053" class="">dies</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="4442" class="">fire</st> is <st data-num="3756" class="">never</st> <st data-num="4570" class="">quenched</st>.
<st data-num="3956" class="">Everyone</st> will be <st data-num="233" class="">salted</st> with <st data-num="4442" class="">fire</st>.<n id="1" />
Salt is good, but if it loses its saltiness, how can you make it salty again? Have salt in yourselves, and be at peace with each other.”
